title: Pixel Runner
shortDescription: An endless runner with retro pixel art aesthetics.
longDescription: Pixel Runner is a fast-paced endless runner game featuring beautiful retro pixel art graphics. Dodge obstacles, collect coins, and see how far you can run! Features multiple characters, power-ups, and leaderboards.

title: Space Defender
shortDescription: Defend Earth from alien invasion in this classic shooter.
longDescription: Space Defender is a classic top-down space shooter. Control your ship, destroy waves of alien invaders, and protect humanity! Features 50 levels, boss battles, and weapon upgrades.

title: Puzzle Quest
shortDescription: A relaxing match-3 puzzle game with RPG elements.
longDescription: Puzzle Quest combines classic match-3 gameplay with RPG progression. Level up your character, unlock new abilities, and complete quests through hundreds of puzzles. Perfect for casual gaming sessions.

title: Dungeon Crawler X
shortDescription: Explore procedurally generated dungeons in this roguelike.
longDescription: Dungeon Crawler X is a challenging roguelike with procedurally generated dungeons. Each run is unique! Find loot, fight monsters, and try to reach the final boss. Permadeath makes every decision matter.

title: Farm Life Simulator
shortDescription: Build your dream farm in this cozy simulation game.
longDescription: Farm Life Simulator lets you build and manage your own farm. Plant crops, raise animals, build relationships with townspeople, and expand your farming empire. A relaxing experience for all ages.
